title: Implement Health Scoring Algorithm
close_reason: Implemented HealthScoringService with full algorithm: security penalties (Critical -15, High -8, Medium -2, Low -0.5), usage adjustments, maintenance bonuses, documentation adjustments, and overdue task penalties

title: Implement Reports & Export
close_reason: Implemented Reports with Portfolio Health, Task Analytics, Security Trends, and Capability Breakdown views. Added CSV/JSON export functionality for applications, tasks, and full reports.

title: Implement Heatmap Visualizations
close_reason: Implemented Heatmap with Grid and Treemap views, WCAG accessibility (high contrast mode, patterns, aria labels), filtering by capability/health, sorting, and application detail modal

title: Implement Applications List Page
close_reason: Implemented fully functional Applications page with search, health status filters, sorting, pagination, and application cards showing health scores, security issues, usage, and ownership

title: Implement Data Jobs Dashboard
close_reason: Implemented Data Jobs Dashboard with data source cards, job statistics, execution history with filtering, and job detail modal with logs

title: Implement Tasks Management Page
close_reason: Implemented Tasks Management Page with summary cards, filter tabs, task type filter, task cards with priority/status/escalation, and complete task functionality

title: Build Mock Data Service Layer
close_reason: Created mock data models (Application, LifecycleTask, User, HealthScore) and MockDataService with realistic test data for 40 applications

title: Implement Admin Configuration
close_reason: Implemented Admin Configuration with Health Scoring config, User Management, Task Settings, Audit Log, and System Settings sections
